content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a case in the district court in ljubljana the case started on october 2 2012 and ended on july 3 2014 lasting for a total of 1 year and 9 months the specific parties involved are not mentioned the final resolution determined the value of the goods involved in the lawsuit to be 8500000 eur the ex partners were involved in the division of assets with the plaintiff being awarded the real estate property and the defendant ordered to pay the plaintiffs share of 9300000 eur the decision was based on a specific law called the civil procedure act specifically section 306 which deals with court settlements the court settlement in this case is confidential meaning that the details cannot be disclosed there is no translation available for this document
